typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	cols as string ('movies,title,genres')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(hashrow1 = sha2(256,columns()),
		hashrow2 = sha2(256,byNames(split($cols,',')))) ~> Hash Rows
Hash Rows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
